titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1938 PAUL Mr Elliot Inv. 58-39 42 ave de la Bourdonnais
3 months 2 vols 100 no deposit necessary
Nov 16 A New American History Nov 22 16 Paris Commune of 1871 Nov 22 Nov 22 Journeyman Dec 9 Dec 9 Man who knew Coolidge Dec 15 " At 33 Dec 15 Dec 15 Merchants of Death Jan 25 15 Gracie Allen Murder Case Jan 25 15 Bottom Dogs (no extra charge) Jan 25 owes Poore: Goya 147 frs paid Jan 25 Jan 31 Case of the Lame Canary Feb 14 31 Daughter Feb 14 Feb 14 Murphy Feb 21 14 Fashion in Shrouds 21 Feb 21 Death Wears a White Gardenia March 7 21 Journalist's Wife March 7 March 7 Tender is the Night " 13 7 Pity is not enough " 13
Renewed Feb 16 - May 16 1939 100v
March 13 America Mar 20 13 The Garden Murder Case Mar 20 Christmas tree Murders Mar 21 Wild Palms Mar 21
to May 16 PAUL 1939 Mar 21 Theme is Murder Mar 27 21 Glass Slipper Mar 27 21 Judas Window Mar 27 27 Murder of Convenience Apr 5 27 Bigger they Come Apr 5 Apr 5 Four of Hearts Apr 24 5 Murder in the Bud Apr 24 24 Banbury Bog May 2 24 Death in 5 Boxes May 2 May 2 Warrant for X May 15 2 Case of the Shoplifters's Shoe May 18 15 Drop to his Death May 22 15 Case of the Perjured Parrot May 22 May 16 - July 16 2 m 2 v 70 May 23 Lillian Wald july 24 23 Woman in the Hall July 24
Sent p.c. July 20th.
